#summary MonMon Introduction Page.

= Introduction =

MonMon uses Scintilla to create a pleasant tabbed Lua editor. 
If you want to play with the code you'll ScintillaNET(http://www.codeplex.com/ScintillaNET) and NUnit(http://www.nunit.org/).

= Features =

  * Multiple tabs
  * Find All
  * Function listing
